function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertain deposition rates of COVID-19-laden particles in real-world conditions","Impact":"Increased risk of surface transmission via fomites","Mitigation":"Conduct further studies to understand deposition rates in real-world conditions, and implement effective ventilation and air filtration systems","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, ventilation systems","People":"Occupants of poorly ventilated rooms or spaces","Owner":"Public health authorities, building managers"},{"Description":"Potential risk of increasing the re-suspension of virus-laden particles within the space due to the use of desk fans","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of viruses","Mitigation":"Avoid the use of desk fans unless stagnant zones are identified, and ensure proper orientation of fans to increase mixing with the wider space","Technologies":"CO2 monitoring systems, fan orientation systems","People":"Occupants of spaces with stagnant zones","Owner":"Building managers, occupant health and safety committees"}]}
